name: Ghost Bois: Pac-Huntas
description:
Play as 2 Ghosts (WASD, Arrow Keys) and Hunt Down the yellow Pac-men.
Avoid the red Pac-men!

Controls:
WASD [P1 Pink] and Arrow Keys [P2 Blue]
ESC to pause and unpause.
Playable Solo or Local Co-op.

Music: Pac-Man "Main Theme" arranged/performed by: Andrew Allen
